title: Copy swipe and post-swipe components from FO-03
description:
Copy the swipe phase and post-swipe components from FO-03.

Files to copy to app/fo-04/components/:
- swipe-phase.tsx
- step-checkpoint.tsx
- step-background.tsx
- step-notifications.tsx
- step-paywall.tsx
- step-completion.tsx

Update imports to use fo-04 paths.
These are identical to FO-03 for the swipe and completion phases.
acceptance_criteria: All 6 component files exist in app/fo-04/components/ with correct imports
